Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Please indicate how often you performed each activity in your healthiest and most active state, in the past year.
Field.ElementLabel: Running: running while playing a sport or jogging

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, Less than one time in a month 
 1, One time in a month 
 2, One time in a week 
 3, 2 or 3 times in a week 
 4, 4 or more times in a week

StructuredValue.Value: Less than one time in a month
4 or more times in a week

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, Less than one time in a month 
 1, One time in a month 
 2, One time in a week 
 3, 2 or 3 times in a week 
 4, 4 or more times in a week

StructuredValue.Value: Less than one time in a month
4 or more times in a week

Field.ElementLabel: Decelerating: coming to a quick stop while running

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, Less than one time in a month 
 1, One time in a month 
 2, One time in a week 
 3, 2 or 3 times in a week 
 4, 4 or more times in a week

StructuredValue.Value: Less than one time in a month
4 or more times in a week

Field.ElementLabel: Pivoting: turning your body with your foot planted while playing a sport; For example: skiing, skating, kicking, throwing, hitting a ball (golf, tennis, squash), etc.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, Less than one time in a month 
 1, One time in a month 
 2, One time in a week 
 3, 2 or 3 times in a week 
 4, 4 or more times in a week

StructuredValue.Value: Less than one time in a month
4 or more times in a week
